readable.title: 3690431163_1d81e19549
readable.content: A cop is standing next to a person dressed like a clown . A female police officer stands next to a woman dressed as the Joker in Batman . A man with face makeup and a red piece of fabric hanging from her mouth is being escorted by a police officer . A policewoman standing next to a person wearing bright red glasses . Policewoman , with person streaked with colors and with red cloth in mouth .
